item.title: About
item.description: We’re a handpicked collective of developers, engineers and managers who like to keep things simple by not being too clever. TODO Add pictures of everyone on the front page Add more words to the About page Add more words on the Home page

item.title: First Post
item.description: First Post Hopefully this is the first of many posts by the people in Unclever Labs. But.. they’re probably too lazy to post, which is totally OK!
